message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but $170 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit to $150. I believe that's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
I'm still interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
